description: This certificate confirms the comprehensive renovation and rejuvenation undergone by an asset, enhancing its performance, appearance, and functionality to meet or exceed its original specifications, contributing to circular economy principles.

BpnlTrait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNL is composed of prefix 'BPNL', 10 digits and two alphanumeric letters.

Timestamp.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

UuidV4Trait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

Text.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

Date.description: Describes a Property which contains the date.

RecyclingStrategyCertificateCharacterist.description: Describes the characteristic of Recycling strategy certificate

supplier.description: BPN of the business partner who creates this certificate

issueDate.description: This is the date when the certificate was issued.

catenaXId.description: The Catena-X ID of the given part (e.g. the assembly), valid for the Catena-X dataspace.

articleNumber.description: Unique identification assigned by the authorized company for internal referencing

revocationDate.description: The date when the certificate is revoked by the issuer. This only happens in exceptional cases when an asset has been marked as reused by error or any other error is made in the issuance of the certificate. Certificates may be revoked up to 7 working days after they have been issued.

van.description: Vehicle Anonymized Number of vehicle of which this component has been dismantled.

vehicleCatenaXId.description: Catena X ID of the Vehicle from which this component has been dismantled.

KeyTrait.description: Constraint that ensures that the standard keys and custom key prefixes can be used.

KeyValueList.description: A list of key value pairs for local identifiers, which are composed of a key and a corresponding value.

key.description: The key of a local identifier.

LocalIdentifierCharacteristic.description: A single serialized part may have multiple attributes, that uniquely identify a that part in a specific dataspace (e.g. the manufacturer`s dataspace)

certificate.description: A property of the model, named certificate.

partInstanceId.description: The serial number of the part from the manufacturer
